attributes.additional_details:
It is time for David Cameron to Put Britain first. We decent, law-abiding British Citizens will not tolerate the crime riddled thug culture that is happening on our streets resulting in riots....looting.....mugging of innocent people.
You are one of the first to step in and help other countries in their time of need....NOW is the time to help us.
No more pussy-footing about Mr. Cameron.....
IT IS TIME TO GET TOUGH WITH THE THUGS..........
